00022 /// @file SpecialSnps.h

00029 #include <cstring>
00030 #include <map>

00033 
00034 
00035 typedef std::map<std::string, std::vector<int> > CopyNumberMap; 
00036 
00037 // This function will read in a file which has copy number data for a set of samples. The first row
00038 // will consist of the string "marker_id" followed by strings representing the names of the samples
00039 // being analyzed.  The first column will be assumed to have a string value representing the marker 
00040 // name. Subsequent columns will be integer values representing the copy number values for the 
00041 // sample/marker.  
00042 void readCopyNumberFile(CopyNumberMap &copyNumberMap,
00043                                                 const std::string& copyNumberFilePath);
00044 
00045 
00046 typedef std::map<std::string,std::pair<int, int> > SpecialSnpMap;
00047 typedef std::map<std::string,std::pair<int, int> >::const_iterator SpecialSnpMapIter;
00048 typedef std::map<std::string,std::vector<int> > SpecialSampleSnpMap;
00049 typedef std::vector<std::string> SpecialSampleNameVector;
00050 
00051 // Return a map where the key is the SNP name, and the value is a pair of ints:
00052 // {# of copies for males, # of copies for females}
00053 void readSpecialSnpsFile(SpecialSnpMap *specialSnps,
00054                          std::string *chipType,
00055                          std::string *specialSnpVersion,
00056                          const std::string& specialSnpsPath);
00057 
00058 void readSpecialSampleSnpsFile( SpecialSampleSnpMap *specialSampleSnps,
00059                                 SpecialSampleNameVector *specialSampleName,
00060                                 const std::string& specialSampleSnpsPath);
00061 
00062 // For backward-compatibility with old chrX files
00063 void makeSpecialSnpsFromChrXFile(SpecialSnpMap *specialSnps,
00064                                  const std::string& chrXPath);
00065 
00066 // convert between in-memory formats
00067 void specialFromHaploid(SpecialSnpMap &SpecialSnps,
00068                         std::map<std::string,bool> &haploidSnps);
00069 void haploidFromSpecial(SpecialSnpMap &SpecialSnps,
00070                         std::map<std::string,bool> &haploidSnps );
00071 
00072 // read in chrXsnps file format
00073 void fillInHaploidSnps(std::string file,
00074                        std::map<std::string,bool> &haploidSnps,
00075                        ChipLayout *layout,
00076                        bool permissive);
00077 void fillInHaploidSnpsVersion2(std::string file,
00078                                std::map<std::string,bool> &haploidSnps,
00079                                ChipLayout *layout,
00080                                bool permissive);
00081 void fillInHaploidSnpsVersion1(std::string file, 
00082                                std::map<std::string,bool> &haploidSnps, 
00083                                ChipLayout *layout, 
00084                                bool permissive);

00086 /**
00087  * @brief Determines if special snp is from chrX based on male/female cn
00088  */
00089 bool isChrX(const SpecialSnpMapIter& specialSnp);
00090 
00091 /**
00092  * @brief Determines if special snp is from chrY based on male/female cn
00093  */
00094 bool isChrY(const SpecialSnpMapIter& specialSnp);
00095 
00096 /**
00097  * @brief Determines if special snp is from chrX or chrY
00098  */
00099 bool isHaploid(const SpecialSnpMapIter& specialSnp);
00100 
00101 /**
00102  * @brief Determines if given probeset_name is a special snp and if it is from chrX or chrY
00103  */
00104 bool isHaploid(const SpecialSnpMap& snpMap, const std::string& probeset_name);
